channel.title: Help with ::yell command

item.title: Help with ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Replace

                yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));

with

if(playerRights > 0) {
    yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "+ command.substring(5));
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @xd_own3d_xd xd own3d xd
item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

this may sound stupid but where about would i insert that into the existing code?, could you paste what i need to replace my old one with

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You need to put a condition checking the rights around the yell() method invocation:

if(playerRights > 0) { yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "+ command.substring(5)); }

That should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @xd_own3d_xd xd own3d xd
item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

Hey, at the moment i have this:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}

However normal players can still you the yell command, any help please?

Read full topic
